preqs: Either PHO1203 or FNA1111 or VPR1001 or VIS1111 and OHS1000

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {FNA1111, PHO1203, VIS1111, VPR1111} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit introduces students to studio practice and the construction of photographic illusion. It builds upon the skills and knowledge of photomedia by focusing upon creative image production through 'fabricated' photography approaches. Students will develop their understanding and application of lens-based photography through exploring the construction of photographic "reality". Students will have the opportunity to explore studio photography (i.e. digital and medium format cameras, tungsten and electronic studio lighting, tableaux and constructions).
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
